snippet: European Union leaders agreed to sign a new measure to enforce fiscal austerity and restrict stimulus, which could be a dangerous approach.
abstract: Editorial scores European leaders for agreeing to sign a fiscal compact that will legally restrict them from fighting recessions with robust fiscal stimulus; warns measure fails to increase the bailout fund to protect Europe's ailing economies from defaulting on their bonds; places much of the blame on the poor leadership of German Chancellor Angela Merkel.
lead_paragraph: European Union leaders agreed to sign a new measure to enforce fiscal austerity and restrict stimulus, which could be a dangerous approach.
